transcript.text: shabbat shalom this is Daniel John Lee
with Torah restoration ministries it is
April the 30th 2016 the 4th Shabbat of
the Hebrew Newsham it a year that
started in early April and I just wanted
to give a podcast about what I consider
is the best Jesus or Yahshua movie ever
made and there are you know some good
ones out there like that miniseries of
Jesus of Nazareth that was made back in
the 70s but in my opinion this one that
was released this past February in 2016
is the best in fact it was released just
in time for Purim for those of you who
celebrated Purim it was released just
around that time so it's pretty awesome
but this movie with Ralph Fiennes in
fact they have a lot of big-name actors
in this movie that are just exceptional
acting but what's unique about this
movie is that rather than really
charting the life of Yahshua which is
pretty much what all the Jesus other
Jesus movies are about this one charts
it basically starts at his death and
then goes through the the 40 or so days
between his resurrection and ascension
to when he is when he of course ascends
for the last time up to the heavens 10
days prior to Shavo or Pentecost when
the Ruach comes down and so that's
that's unique in and of itself but the
main character is not one of the
disciples or Yahshua himself the main
character of course is this Roman
centurion or general who basically is in
charge of the two Roman centurion guards
that guard the tomb and it's an
incredible film there are scenes in this

break it and you start weeping I mean it
is incredible and I don't want to give
away a lot of what happens but I will
just highlight one scene which you know
for any of you who've read the Gospels
you're familiar with the scene where you
know after Yasha was already resurrected
and the disciples have actual already
seen him a couple times one of the last

they can't catch any fish and then they
see someone on the shore of the Galilee
that calls out to them and says throw
your net on the other side and of course
as they do and they
they catch all this huge amount of fish
153 fish it instantly reminds Jochen on

and so immediately yoga Don said it's
it's Robert Rob and I it's the Lord it's
its Yahshua and in in in the scene of

the boat starts running splashing water
running toward Yahshua he's yelling yeah
she won and all the disciples start
clamoring I was voting right and it's
just the scene with the with the with
the water flying and the disciples

not you know one problem with some

I can't recommend it enough this is by
